item.title: Dotnet Core 3.1 appsettings mapping with IOptions, IOptionsSnapshot and IOptionsMonitor
item.description: Map appsettings.json to strongly-typed classes using the Options pattern. For behavior differences between IOptions, IOptionsSnapshot, and IOptionsMonitor, see the official documentation. Define the settings class class AppSettings { public string AadTenantName { get; set; } public string AadClientApplicationId { get; set; } } Add settings to appsettings.json { "Logging": { "LogLevel": { ..... } }, "AllowedHosts": "*", "Settings": { "AadTenantName": "comercia.onmicrosoft.com", "AadClientApplicationId": "5e416176-9f18-4a96-9ce3-97f27599fb20" } } Register the configuration section // Startup.
